text: Mister Chile is a national beauty pageant that selects Chile's representative to the male pageants.Mister Chile 2014 The Ft Model Chile organizes the pageant since 2009. Felipe Toledo Gaete is the current director of the Mister Chile competition.REEMPLAZADOS DOS CANDIDATOS A MISTER CHILE 2014 ==Titleholders== ;Color key {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" !width="30" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Year !width="180" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Mister Chile !width="400" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Achievements |- |-style="background-color:#FFFF66;" | 2009 | Robinson Tajmuch Poblete | 1st Runner-up, Mister Internet, Mister Photogenic at Men Universe Model 2009 |- |-style="background-color:#FFFF66;" | 2010 | Leo Andrés Opazo Becerra | 1st Runner-up at Men Universe Model 2010 |- |-style="background-color:#FFFACD;" | 2011 | Danilo Rodríguez | Top 10 at Men Universe Model 2011 |- |-style="background-color:#FFFF66;" | 2012 | Alberto Byers | 5th Runner-up at Men Universe Model 2012 |- |-style="background-color:#FFFACD;" | 2013 | Pablo Andrés Alcayaga Moliné | Top 16 at Mister International 2013 |- |-style="background-color:gold;" | 2014 | Cristóbal Andrés Álvarez Leiva | Winner at Mister Real Universe 2015 and Top 13 at Mister Global 2014 |- | 2015 | Not pageant held | - |- | 2016 | Victor Alonso Candia Aravena | TBA |- |} ===Representatives at Mister International=== ;Color key The winner of Mister Chile represents Chile at the Mister International pageant.
